Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1985, off Mike Lacoss (KC)...
Injured on 4/17/1985 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 5/31/1985, off Frank Tanana (TEX)...
8/31/1985: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $860,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/3/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $1,100,000 per year...
